bibl.title: A Survey of Toponyms in Egypt in the Graeco-Roman Period. (Trismegistos Online Publications. II.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - Alphabetical list [more than 8700 Egyptian toponyms and 240 obsolete 'ghost names']. - Geographical list.
bibl.seg: VERRETH Herbert, A Survey of Toponyms in Egypt in the Graeco-Roman Period. (Trismegistos Online Publications. II.)
Köln - Leuven, Trismegistos, 2008, 893 pp. ISBN 978-94-9060-403-5. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.trismegistos.org/top.php >.]
